name: Unblock It.
description:
Unblock it - brain training puzzle game. It’s easy to play and all you need to do is move the blocks. But it’s a highly addictive puzzle game. Have fun killing time with it!

■ Description ■
Unblock It is a free puzzle game where you try to get the blocks out of the way of the exit.
Unblock It - comes with 5 difficulties ranging from Starter to Expert. There are About 20000 puzzles, the highest amount of puzzles you'll find in any game. The goal is to unblock the red color block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of the way, unblock it with the minimal moves.

■ Rules ■
You clear the stage by going through the exit. Create an escape route by moving the blocks that are in the way.
- You can get 1 stars by clearing in the fewest moves possible.
- Scores can be registered on the ranking.

Do the puzzles and aim for the world’s top place! Any questions, please feel free to contact azhuona@gmail.com
